locations.title: Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry
locations.remarks: Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, often shortened to Hogwarts, was the British wizarding school located in the Scottish Highlands.[6][7] Any magical children residing in Great Britain or Ireland who had reached the age of eleven by the start of the incoming term were accepted as students.[8][9] It was a state-owned school, funded by the British Ministry of Magic.[10]

parties.name: Hogwards School of Witchcraft and Wizardry

addr-lines: Hogwarts School of WitchCraft and Wizardry

components.title: Brass Scales
components.description: Scales used for measuring contents of potions

components.title: Magical Drafts and Potions
components.description: Course on the concoction and use of magical drafts and potions.

components.title: Dark Arts Defence - Basics for Beginners
components.description: Introductory course for defending against the dark arts

components.title: Quidditch
components.description:
was a wizarding sport played on flying broomsticks.[1] It was the most popular and well-known game among wizards and witches, and, according to Rubeus Hagrid, the wizard equivalent to Muggles' passion for football.

The game was played by two teams with seven members each. The object of the game was to score more points than the opposing team.

components.title: Defense Against the Dark Arts Class
Tri Wizard Tournament
components.description: To introduce students to the magical community

components.title: wingardium leviosa
components.remarks: Be careful with spell, results are inconsistent

components.title: Avada Kedavra

props.name: vendor-name
props.value: He who shall not be named

status.remarks: Operational Status of Curse is restricted.  Should never be used

components.remarks: NOT TO BE USED UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCES

components.title: Sectumsempra
components.description: causes brutal lacerations on the target's body as if they've been slashed with an invisible blade.

status.remarks: Under major modification, still in development

components.remarks: Caution, could be deadly if right counter not used

components.title: Riddikulus
components.description:
The spell that defeats a Boggart can be tricky, because it involves making the creature into a figure of fun, so that fear can be dispelled in amusement. If the caster is able to laugh aloud at the Boggart, it will disappear at once. The incantation is Riddikulus, and the intention is to force the Boggart to assume a less-threatening and hopefully comical form."
     Description of the Boggart-Banishing Spell

components.title: Second Module Name
components.remarks: Notes for second module data in transit

components.title: Destination Object
components.remarks: Be careful with spell, results are inconsistent

components.title: Boggarts
components.description: A Boggart was an amortal shape-shifting non-being that took on the form of its observer's worst fear. Because of their shape-shifting ability, no one knew what a Boggart looked like when it was alone, as it changed shape instantly upon encountering someone.[
